Download


```{r}
# load libraries
library(MODISTools)

# download and save phenology data
phenology <- MODISTools::mt_subset(
  product = "MCD12Q2",
  lat = 43.5,
  lon = 74.5,
  band = "Greenup.Num_Modes_01",
  start = "2001-01-01",
  end = "2009-12-31",
  km_lr = 100,
  km_ab = 100,
  site_name = "swiss",
  internal = TRUE,
  progress = FALSE)
```
